articles.author: Edited by India TV Trending Desk
articles.title: MS Dhoni removes his jacket & burns the dance floor as he joins Hardik Pandya, Badshah | VIRAL VIDEO - India TV News
articles.description: MS Dhoni has won the Internet yet again. This time not with his cricket skills but with his dance moves. Videos of Captain Cool dancing with his friends, DJ-ing and singing have gone viral on social media. Watch viral videos here.
articles.content: MS Dhoni was caught on camera having a gala time with cricketers Hardik Pandya, Ishan Kishan and Krunal Pandya among others. The former India captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni was also joined by his wife … [+1689 chars]

articles.author: Anil Dias
articles.title: 'Felt Humiliated': Indian chess Grand Master SL Narayanan after being made to stand barefeet for metal detector check in middle of playing hall - The Indian Express
articles.description: Arbiter apologised after the detector beeped for another player as well, but a disturbed Narayanan lost the subsequent match.
articles.content: Indian GM SL Narayanan says he “felt humiliated” after he was made to stand barefoot in the middle of a playing hall before his match while playing in the Bundesliga chess league on Sunday.So affecte… [+3341 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Steve Waugh: 'The public has almost overdosed on cricket' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "For the fans and spectators, it is hard to make a connection because you're not sure who is playing"
